long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension is a powerful tool designed exclusively to bridge Google Mail and EasyDrive for a frictionless file-sharing experience. In essence, it serves one invaluable purpose: seamless file transfers between your emails and EasyDrive's VPH folder structure. With just a few clicks, effortlessly upload files received via email to EasyDrive, or attach files from EasyDrive to your new emails in Gmail.
